original_title: Ladies, Gentlemen, and Everyone in Between
overview: A short essay film attempting to formally combine day-to-day props and itineraries in Beirut. These elements, whether formally gendered or transformed into something that is, all become part of a personal narrative where I am made aware of my gender. This experiment challenges the notion of the binary as I navigate through the city as both male, female, and neither.
title: Ladies, Gentlemen, and Everyone in Between
